com.oracle.bmc.hdfs

Class Bmc

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.AbstractFileSystem
      • org.apache.hadoop.fs.DelegateToFileSystem
        • com.oracle.bmc.hdfs.Bmc

  • @InterfaceAudience.Public
 @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public class Bmc
extends DelegateToFileSystem
    Oracle Cloud Infrastructure implementation of AbstractFileSystem. Delegates to BmcFilesystem.

    To enable, set: 

     <property>
   <name>fs.AbstractFileSystem.oci.impl</name>
   <value>com.oracle.bmc.hdfs.Bmc</value>
 </property>
